title: Live in Boston
teaser:
A special live edition of The Moth in Boston, hosted by Steve Burns with additional hosting by Jay Allison.  A teenage boy confronts his stepfather; a telecommunications executive details his descent into deceit; and a young stroke victim attempts a hospital escape in order to attend a birthday party.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media in Woods Hole, Massachusetts.
contentencoded:
Matthew Dicks is a teenage boy who works hard to impress his step-father.
 
Walter Pavlo is an MCI manager who learns that crime does not pay.
 
Nina Mitchell is a young stroke victim who sneaks out of the hospital to attend a party.
